remarks: More general version of ~ 3imtr4i .  Useful for converting conditional definitions in a formula.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1995.)
statement:
3imtr4d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
3imtr4d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( th <-> ps ) ) $.
3imtr4d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ta <-> ch ) ) $.
3imtr4d $p |- ( ph -> ( th -> ta ) ) $.
